resources.string:
The FarePayment App is an android app built to help commuters pay their fare in matatus. 

With the use of Qr Code Technology this App is able to incorporate security,reliability,and fast payment methods that will ensure user satisfaction. 

The App brings easiness and convenience to the fare payment process, eradicating the traditional methods of fare payment.
Welcome to the help center for FarePayment App!\n\nHere you will find answers to your questions, guides on how to use our features, and ways to contact support if you need further assistance.

"How do I create an account?"

To create an account, click on the "Sign Up" button on the home screen and follow the prompts.

"I forgot my password,what should I do?"

Click on the "Forgot Password?" button on the home screen and follow the instructions to reset your password.
Getting Started with FarePayment App \n\nLearn how to use the FarePayment App features by following these steps:[LINK]

If you need further assistance, please contact our support team. 

Email: support@farepaymentapp.com 

Phone: +254 700 000 000

Stay up to date with the latest features and improvements. Check our release notes [LINK] to see what is new in the latest version of the FarePayment App.
